mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cart where userId = '${userId}'
select p.productNo p.productName c.productQty p.productPrice p.productCategory p.productImgPath from cart c, product p where p.productNo = c.productNo and c.userId = '${userId}';
select productName, productPrice from product where p.productNo = '${productNo}';
mapper.insert: insert into cart (userId, productNo, productName, productCategory, productPrice, productQty) values (#{userId}, #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{productCategory}, #{productPrice}, #{productQty});
